author: jpsnover
body:
`PS> gcm *item,*content -ParameterName STREAM | get-help -Parameter STREAM`

NOTE - This is on WIndows as well as LInux

comments.author: vors
comments.body: This repo doesn't have help content. We will eventually use https://github.com/powershell/PowerShell-Docs to host it.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Fixed now that we have help content. 👍

title: Help content for -Parameter STREAM is wrong for *-CONTENT & *-ITEM cmdlets
